website_summaries.verdict: A great scale for occasional use that works well and does not cost a lot of money.
pros: Weight indicator can be mounted on the wall
Can be battery powered or used with an AC adapter
Zeroes itself each time it powers up
Works well with letters and packages
cons: Accuracy on this scale does not seem to be quite as good as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Gives different numbers every time.  Never matches my other verified scales.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it, but it gives me different numbers every time for the same item. It seems to be off by about 3%, and that can be 3% high or 3% low. on a level surface with no vibrations, i can put a pot on and off and on and off and get different numbers every time. so this is useless to me. i make soap, and if my lye measured high and the oil measured low, then i would have unsafe soap!!!
customer_reviews.author: myob

customer_reviews.title: Does not weigh correctly
customer_reviews.text: I started receiving my shipments back stating that postage was due. I reweighed everything and it all looked good. So I took my packages to the post office. They weighed them and said they were 1-2 ounces more than what this scale told me. So I tested this scale with a lightweight item. I weighed my cell phone on my little 13 oz. postage stamp scale = 5.5 oz. My cell phone at the post office - 5.5 oz. My cell phone on this scale = 4.6 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down the Best Mid Line Scale for mail / Ebay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a scale to save money on shipping through Ebay. I read reviews and chose this one. Boy am I glad I did as this scale is awesome. It can handle a 1oz up to 110lb. Is very well built and is ready to use right out of the box. Can use 2 batteries that are included or plug into the wall. What else is needed. I saved enough shipping through Ebay this weekend that I already covered the cost of this. Wish I did this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: 2 scales both with problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought our first one, worked find for 6 month, than started acting up, had to tare all the time. Bought a second one, 4 months now, same thing is starting. No more! 1-2 oz off all the time. Buying a different brand now. Don't buy it if you use it a lot, maybe works for occasional shipping.
customer_reviews.author: dynamok

customer_reviews.title: Just won't work after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Had this scale for just a few months and already it won't work any longer. Changed batteries and used with the wall plug it came with still won't work. Very bad product. I just weigh light objects about 4lbs or less. Not even sure where to go from here. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service. Stopped working two months in. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after two months. I emailed support (support@smartweighscales.com) total of 4 times and have given up. I have Never got a response once. The product is not good. Neither is the company as they won't even respond to you. Worked well until I noticed it was using all my batteries fairly quickly. I went to use the wall plug and it wouldn't power on. So I thought maybe the wall plug was defective. Now the whole thing won't turn on. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. THIS PRODUCT IS AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Ton

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product when I first received it and thought it would be just what I needed for my business. I used it a couple times when I first got it. Plugged it in and went to use it today, and it no longer works. The light came on, so its not a battery or power supply issue, but nothing registers. May try to see if I can find another cable that connects the scale to the digital display, perhaps the cable has issues. At this point, I will probably be shopping for a different scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very usable scale
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to use the power cable this is an ok scale. The problem though is the battery compartment cover is loose and falls off with the slightest touch. The power cord is on the opposite side of display unit so you have cords coming out both sides. It's just really awkward to handle. The other major issue is the power cable is super short, about 3ft. I was expecting the power cable plugged into the base of the scale and then the went through the curly cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a right handy scale
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I began to use this shipping scale. It has a separate detachable display that has large numerals that are easy for old eyes to read. It uses batteries which means it can be placed on any flat surface such as the floor for convenient weighing, but it also has an AC power supply for fixed locations. So far, the accuracy matches that of the local post office scales, and that bolsters my confidence in buying postage for shipping. It weighs up to 110# (haven't tested that yet) and as little as 0.1 oz. This is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Iatros

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scale for Ebay shipping
customer_reviews.text: I sell a lot of items on Ebay and this scale has come in very handy. It has been very accurate as I haven't had any complaints from buyers or the post office after shipping about 100 packages with it. I like that you can use either batteries or plug it in. For me though, it turns off too soon while on batteries, I would like it to stay on about 10 seconds longer. By the time I finish packing up my package, it will have turned off and I have to wait about 10-15 seconds for it to turn back on. Not a big deal. I would purchase it again if it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond A Trussell

customer_reviews.title: This just never worked for us. All weights were ...
customer_reviews.text: This just never worked for us. All weights were off by a few ounces. Seemed tempermental.....we should have returned it....but we were sure one day it would wake up and work right......still waiting for that day.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Knoblich

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for awhile and then....
customer_reviews.text: I loved this scale. Easy to read, numbers away from the scale so you can see. Then...suddenly...the number 5 stopped working on it. For example, if I want to measure 25 grams of salt, it will only measure 24 grams or 26 grams, not 25. I messaged the company on their Facebook page last month and they never replied:(
customer_reviews.author: HikingInNature

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! I have a Etsy shop and this has already save me ton of money cause I’m now able to print my own shipping label! Very recommended it’s very accurate and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin cantillo

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good scale to weight packages that I ship. This scale is simply awesome! It is very easy to use and is very accurate. It displays the weight down to the tenth of an ounce (i.e. 21 lbs. 14.3 oz.) I love that the display is wired so that if I'm weighing something large I can easy read the weight. This was a great investment and I have already used it dozens of times. I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Precourt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Weighs stuff 6 ways til Sunday by decimals or ounces or whatever you might need. Fires up quick, holds Tare weight and I can add material while it keeps track of the total weight until it's exactly what I want. Note that I am not weighing stuff all day long so that Auto-Off is fine for me. I have also checked it a bit with known weights and it seems very accurate. NOTE that I paid $30- for this, it is currently showing for $96- and I wouldn't pay anywhere close to that for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Extended display is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: We send lots of large shipments and the extended display has made all the difference. Before, we used a scale with the attached display and the boxes would be so big we had a hard time seeing the weight. So we'd have to move it and balance it and guess the actual weight since we had to touch the box and make shift things to hold it on the scale. We don't have up the display but just the fact that it can extend and move, we can just move the display around and see it! I would not recommend any other scale after using this one. It's helped us tremendously and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Izzie

customer_reviews.title: Deadly Accurate Scale
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little scale. I have my packages scanned at my USPS post office where they weigh it again for verification, and it's perfectly accurate with their scale down to the tenth oz (e.g. 8.1 oz = 8.1 oz over there). A great scale like this is a must have even if you don't ship packages out very often because printing postage online saves you money each time (I save like $1 for each package).
customer_reviews.author: Gamearts

customer_reviews.title: That didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It was fine at first, but now the digital readout will not stabelize. With nothing on the scale, it is weighing. Sometimes it shows negative weight...Weird! Anyway, it was deliver May 16, and hubby waited too late to return, so cannot comment on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givens

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me two years before started getting flaky and turning off by itself after a few seconds on, before it finishes the self calibration. I've had two shipments get received by the carrier that were overweight. It says 0lb when nothing on. Time for a new scale.
customer_reviews.author: WestWorks

customer_reviews.title: faulty, not for even the short haul
customer_reviews.text: This scale weighs things lighter than they are or is does not weigh period and it has cost me time and money. It worked well for a while under light use but now it is absolutely unusable. I cant tell if there is a warranty and no one will contact me back
customer_reviews.author: A. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: My old scale about over 15 years of hard use just stopped working. This was the closest one to that old scale. So far I'm pleased with it. Weighs correctly in all modes. Because of the products I use it for have to switch from ounces to gram, etc. This is easy to do. With the off machine read out I can also use it for larger items. So far am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: G. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and EASY to read
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. Well constructed, very accurate, and the main reason I bought it is the availability to have the weight reading box movable. We ship various sizes of packages and having the weight on on the machine was a headache. The reader also folds to sit, which has helped when we had a “glare” problem, and I believe it said it can be mounted on a wall for even easier readings. Wish I would have bought this much sooner,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked. Dud.
customer_reviews.text: My scale didn't work from day one. I bought it for use at my work to weight product. We weight things from 5 ounces up to 25 pounds. Thought it would be convenient to have a scale where the power source was on the face not the scale itself. Too bad I never got to experience the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: CodyHollie

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service Options
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scale very infrequently, but it is consistently wrong. Now it does not even work! This was a rip off, and I do not do negative reviews unless it is absolutely necessary. I have tried to get a response on my options and have not received any sort of reply. I am doing online sales now due to a life circumstance change, (we had to close our trucking business in February) and cannot afford to buy products that do not perform up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: i was happy with it at the beginning. all was great. last week i have noticed that the weight is not accurate. i have lost about $300 for charging customers less than i should. i operated it on batteries so i have change it to the outlet. plugged it to the electricity and it died. very not happy with the product. very not happy with the loss.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built scale and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a scale with a good sturdy base and able to at least weigh package of 40 or more lbs. Which this meets and exceeds. I am very happy with the scale and like that the scale can be powered by battery or plugged in. I also like that the digital read out in not on the scale itself because depending the package size, this can be blocked. So far I really like the scales design and functionality. It is easy to setup and use which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: adam costello

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (and returned) other scales until I found this one. Its small but powerful. I like the fact that I can plug it to the power outlet, and that I can see the weight of even large boxes because the reader can be placed far away from the scale due to the long cable. I also like that I can read the weight in the measure I choose: grams, pounds, ounces, kilograms, etc. Very versatile scale. I hope it las me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and breaks down over a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I used this lightly for the last couple months for mail and to know how much postage on light weight packages will be. I’ve stored this in a clean environment, flat and without anything resting on it. But over time it adds an ounce every couple of weeks without anything on it. I’m very disappointed because now I cannot trust it’s readings. Sure I could subtract what it starts with, but I don’t trust it at all now. Now I can’t return it. I highly suggest you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. I've used it several times and have verified its accuracy. I'm not sure how long it will last, but to this point it's been an excellent tool for Ebay shipping. I've been using it on batteries for a few months - not using the AC adapter without any issues. Nice and compact and having the display remote of the scale is a great feature. Great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ToolMan

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolute garbage, unreliable operation would only work when it felt like it. Nice bright display that is totally useless because it didn’t work properly from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plug feature stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It seems that you can't leave the plug in the unit. I had it plugged in for a few days and it stopped working. I have it working on the batteries, but the electric plug stopped allowing it to get electricity. Kind of disappointing, but it does work well on the batteries. I just don't want to spend money on batteries when I could use the plug, but what am I going to do. I already tossed the box so I can't have it replaced. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Waters

customer_reviews.title: This has been a very handy and accurate device for ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very handy and accurate device for all my auction shipping needs. I don't regret the purchase. It lives on a shelf in my shop and is constantly covered with dust. I blow it off and use it. Even with rather over sized items, it's still very close to the mark. No complaints from the carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hyde

customer_reviews.title: A must have for small business.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect scale for my small home based business. I sho Jewlery and buy my own postage. When I take it to the post office they have to weight it. My weight info at home is spot on with the post office weight scale. This saves me time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Emmil

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and compact, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I put my 10 pound weight on the scale, and 10lbs is exactly what the shipping scale readout stated. That being said, I have not yet gone to the post office (proof). I will update if needed. Meanwhile, I love how I can just plug in the cord to power up the scale if I don’t want use the batteries (provided). Also, the weight screen comes with a cord extender, this way you can see the info without having to peer under a wider box.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrownsuggar

customer_reviews.title: Great for selling computer parts!
customer_reviews.text: CPUs and RAM can fit in a properly padded bubble envelope. Lots of computers that are "old" or not good can have the CPU and RAM removed and sold online. They weight a few ounces and this scale helps with shipping costs. Weight your stuff, you will save over the fitz-n-ships method.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, easy to use, full-function!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design! This product will handle small products (down to 0.15 ounce or 4 gram precision), but up to 110 pounds. The separate scale platform allows for large objects that might normally hang over and obscure view of the read-out. Not a problem with this device. Easy to use - tare, unit options, auto-off, AC batteries or DC cord options. I highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: L. Colten

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, slightly noisy power supply.
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy, noisy power supply. Pros: -Supports heavy 100lb loads! - The separate read out allow for easy measurement of large items that could get in the way. - Readout supports grams, oz, lbs - Nice light blue screen makes it easy to read in a dark room Cons: - If only the readout piece was wireless, oh well that was to be expected ;) - Not sure if it is just my unit, but the power supply puts out a horrible wining noise that is more noticeable when the unit is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost exactly 1 year before failing
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine when it worked. I opted to use AAA batteries most of the time as the power adapter it came with was junk. Here we are 1 year and 4 days after purchasing and the screen is dead, the scale probably still works fine, but the digital read out wont power on with the adapter or new batteries. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic perspectives

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! I love this scale! It’s very accurate, And Is really easy to use. I am giving it 5 stars, because it’s the best scale I’ve ever used and I love being able to keep the scale on the ground so I don’t have to lift as much and it’s nice that the weight shows on a different piece so it can hang on the wall! Love it very impressed
customer_reviews.author: shoppingcrazemama

customer_reviews.title: Great scale.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to help me with a mold in my art studio. I was mixing batches in the 45 lb range. This cheap scale worked flawlessly and was perfect. I am not not sure about it's longevity, but it has already paid for itself. Don't expect a scale rated for 110 lbs to also be accurate at really low weights. If you want a scale like that you will spend hundreds or more. This is an awesome cheap scale.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Hirschman

customer_reviews.title: Best scale ever for shipping
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, so easy to read with the separate display panel. No more trying to use the bathroom scale or bending over to try to read the number under the package like on other scales. Seems very accurate; no issues with eBay shipping charge-backs.
customer_reviews.author: dot2dott

customer_reviews.title: Scale has held up well for such a low cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale has held up well for such a low cost scale. Much cheaper than the office supply stores. I wish the scale pad was a little wider so it would be more stable with larger objects. The plastic housing for the scale pad moves/tries to pop off sometimes so you have to be careful when balancing uneven objects on the scale. Remote display is very handy for large objects that would normally cover up the display if it were built into the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Product L.

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and just buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient having the display separate from the scale. First thing I did after unboxing this was to weigh a few things and compare with an existing scale I have and it was spot on. You can plug it into AC or use batteries (included). Great value!
customer_reviews.author: cscstudent

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I purchased this product how small it's footprint would be. I'm grateful, since I'm in a small apartment. It's accurate as the first box i word i took to be shipped, and the shipper came up with the exact same weight to the hundredths.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Baccaro

customer_reviews.title: Read out is damaged too easily
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until I accidentally hooked the cord between the read out and the scale. It only dropped a little over a foot onto the floor, but now the read out jumps all over the place. I won't buy this kind again, will only get one that has the read out right in the same unit as the scale itself.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Accurate...when it works.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March of 2016. By 2019 the scale still works and is accurate when you can get it to turn on. One of the cords going into the display unit needs to be jiggled, plugged, and unplugged multiple times before the unit will turn on. The cords don't show any damage so I'm assuming the damage is with the port itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to contact seller and got no response. I am disappointed they didn't respond in the 48 HR window as they said they would. The scale was not accurate weighing. My 10 yr old weight watchers was better. It is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaG

customer_reviews.title: I was kinda disappointed when it arrived due to the size thinking it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda disappointed when it arrived due to the size thinking it wouldn't be able to work with larger packages. Well that was wrong this little scale does a great job. It is amazingly accurate and I like how the actual scale is away from the user interface allowing you to see and manipulate modes with the item sitting on the scale. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Headley

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale..
customer_reviews.text: This review is quite late but better late then never,I used this scale for over a year and it worked great never had any problems with it at all,I still have it just haven't been selling anything online in some time but this is a great scale I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shipping scale I’ve used so far. I love the fact that you can have it run on batteries or ac power. I like to just leave mine plugged in on my shipping station. I do wish the plate had more surface area for larger boxes so I don’t have to do balancing acts with 40+ pound boxes. ‘Tis a minor issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted one week!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the remote display for use with larger boxes. Unfortunately after just a few uses during the first week it completely died!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: The one thing it's designed to do, it does quite poorly...
customer_reviews.text: This scale consistently reads items heavier than they actually are. I've made adjustments and recalibrated several times to try and get it reading accurately, but no dice. Each time I take a package with preprinted labels to the post office, I am consistently told I overshot the actual weight by a considerable amount. It's extremely frustrating to watch as inaccurate shipping costs have eaten into my business. Not satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Amazon seller recommends
customer_reviews.text: We sell on Amazon and ship every week, so we needed a good scale to weigh our boxes. I purchased this one for my son, who also ships for us. Then I also have one here at my house that I bought about 6 months ago. It's been great, super convenient. I like that you can plus it in and also use batteries. It's portable and durable. This scale is easy to read and it's been just super great. Highly recommend. We may need another one soon, if sales keep coming!
customer_reviews.author: mlc

customer_reviews.title: Go for it! Quality and value is rare but this is on point
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellent and was very accurate. Was skeptical buying this for a fishing tournament weigh in but it worked flawlessly and I was pleased when compared to other scales marketed for fish weigh ins. Saved tons of money over one of those units and have the same tolerances and accuracy for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Janot

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this scale. It has great features and would be awesome if only it were accurate. I weighed a verified 3 lb weight on it and my bathroom scale. Bathroom scale showed 3 lbs but this scale said 2.97lbs. Then a 55 lb box showed as 52.4lbs. I can’t have shipping numbers be that far off. Not sure if mine was just not calibrated well but I have to send it back because accuracy is really the most important part of a shipping scale.
customer_reviews.author: TDLC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product did just what I wanted it to. The way it is set up I can see the weight even if the package is larger than the scale. I like that it can be either plugged in or use batteries. Handy and does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: L. Revall

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY - GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I do ship several items from my home office. I finally decided to purchase a home scale to be accurate with my shipping costs. This scale is an excellent item. Shipping was quick. The scale is exactly as represented in the ad on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: aztcraig

customer_reviews.title: Accurate works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great use for all my shipping needs never has failed me. I ship alot with usps!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The stretchy cord makes it easy to use for large items as you can move ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for about a year so I can really say it is worthy of 5 stars. The stretchy cord makes it easy to use for large items as you can move the base away from the digital read out with no problem. It is accurate, which is key, double checked it with my local Post Office, and we were both on the same page which is amazing, Cord could be longer, but really that is the only issue, actually for most people the cord is probably going to be just fine. Would recommend this for any number of uses.
customer_reviews.author: True Review

customer_reviews.title: Great for shipping packages
customer_reviews.text: This is great for weighing packages for shipping. I love that it doesn’t need to be plugged in so it is portable. I also like the that display is on a cord away from the scale because many of the packages I ship are large and awkward so I can still read the weight without having to be an acrobat.
customer_reviews.author: H2ologist

customer_reviews.title: But this scale... BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scale to weigh packages for my online etsy shop... This thing is right on! After searching for hours, reading reviews, comparing... Etc... I'm Glad I chose this scale. The detached display is critical for boxes! If you buy one where the display is attached to the scale, good luck reading its weight with a box in the way! It gives you multiple weight options so you don't have to do any conversions or online calculators. It takes the guess work right out of your hands! Now, if I could only make it feed me ice cream or take the dog out to pee on those cold winter mornings... I'd be one super happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's #7 Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When you press the on button to get the weight you have to wait about 4 seconds for the digital readout to zero out from 00 000 to 0lb 0.00Ooz before placing the item on the scale. I like this scale because you can move the readout out of the way. I am giving this 5 stars because I don't mind waiting 4 seconds after initial startup to get an accurate reading. This is easy to use. I use it daily to weigh packages for eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Works just the way i need it to
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small scale for shipping. I must say that i love it! It provides enough accuracy and ease of use that it doesn't take an overwhelming amount of space on my preparation table. You're also able to change the system of measurement, from oz, to lb, to grams. If you're doing a lot of shipping or just have things to weigh in general for a business, then this is your best friend! I was using my weight watcher scale until this came in by jumping on it with the packages i had to ship; i must say that this is much nicer :)
customer_reviews.author: O. Lozneanu

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavier packages
customer_reviews.text: This scale works well for heavier packages. To test accuracy, I weighed a package and then took the package to Fedex to ship. Fedex's scale showed the same weight as this scale. Now that I know it works, this will save me a lot of hassle and let me pre-print labels and schedule pickups rather than having to drop packages off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale I Have Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a big floor scale, that had to be plugged in, was big and bulky, and didn't last that long. I paid TWICE as much for it as I did this product. I use this for mailing everything . . . . from determining if I need 1 stamp or 2 on an envelope, all the way to heavy packages. Pros: Compact Accurate Runs on batteries or wall charger Will weigh anything from 1 oz to 110 pounds. Can use for envelopes as well as heavy packages. Cons: None It simply doesn't get better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Green

customer_reviews.title: You cannot beat this scale and the price. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: I ship daily so I wanted to take some time before giving a review and get some odd and large sizes to see how well this scale works. This is an inexpensive scale that performs excellent. I love the cord on the side. I had to weight a 30 X 26" package today. It is nice that I can pull the reader out of the way and the accuracy of the weight. On certain items I ship, I know how much they weigh. This scale was 100% accurate. I strongly recommend this scale. I'm so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Packages, meat for sausage, cats, I can weigh them all with this scale. While it doesn't get used enough to sit on the counter, It's in the cupboard right below because it's handy as heck. grams, kg, lbs, oz, are all options and it makes it easy to use without a needing to convert measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Dfib

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a lot of time on it yet but boy is it nice to be able to read the scale without having to get creative positioning large boxes. Comparing with my other scales it is quite accurate. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use of this scale. The external display is what I really needed. This works perfectly right out of the box. My old postal scale had a max weight of 5 lbs... I had to guesstimate the rest on heavier items. I do not think I will hit the 110 lbs limit on this one, but it is nice to know I can. So perfect when shipping large boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Just Love this scale
customer_reviews.text: After using a spring scale for many years I finally purchased a digital scale for my shipping. The ACE 110 scale had the best reviews and I have to say they were right on the money. The scale performs flawlessly and is also very accurate. The detached screen makes it very easy to use and the platform is plenty big enough for most items, although I would hate to weigh a 100 pound item on it. This scale has been everything that I had expected and I would recommend it in an instant to anyone who needs a small digital postal scale.
customer_reviews.author: Fulltime traveler

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I bought this. I love the convenience of leaving it plugged in and having it go into sleep mode. There are 4 different settings/modes for weight types. Takes all my large boxes and I can always read the weight since it is on a separate display!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Always over weighs which is better than the opposite
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying this scale based on other reviews. No it's never dead on, but it gets me close enough. Always over weighs which is better than the opposite. I used to mail my etsy items priority because 1-2 lbs was always the same price. With the scale I can make sure I am under a pound and save $3 on every shipping label! I call that money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Daubenmire!

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Has come in so handy for mailing packages. We use this every day and it has been worth every penny. My wife was reluctant and didn't think that we needed it. Previously we would weight items on the bathroom scale. This is so much more accurate and save us the time of running up and down the stairs to weigh each package. I love that it can be plugged in and will stay on. I also like the handy hold function because no matter how hard I try, I always forget what the weight was before I can type it in.
customer_reviews.author: JMSolko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale especially the fact that you can read the weight from the side my other one did have that I had press hold then Leighton the heavy box to see. Great purchase app worth it thank you
customer_reviews.author: LovelyDeals4U

customer_reviews.title: A+ Scale! Accurate, Reliable, Back lighting on Display!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very accurate and reliable scale. I use it for my business and the seperate screen really helps when you have a large box on it and don't want to stress yourself with trying to read the weight on the scale! A+ Rating in my book. Great scale.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Valverde

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: 31 days in mine died The seller replaced it with a new one I am happy again
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Firth

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great scale for the price. I dont have the problem others have mentioned about the scale rounding down. I sell 3 to 5 items a day on ebay and I use this scale for all of them. I compared this with a different scale and they both give the same weight.
customer_reviews.author: btbo

customer_reviews.title: it did work good when it did work
customer_reviews.text: it quick on me under two months. i did not move it around did not drop it. i only weight the must 6 pounds. the return closed so i cannot return it. i'm out of a scale. business is on hold until i buy another one. i will make sure it has a warranty. it did work good when it did work. i was hoping it had a reset button. nope. it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its amazing and the options are helpful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sending out packages, its amazing and the options are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little inaccurate by an ounce sometimes, but it errs on the side of too much. That means when I go to the post office I am always within the price. However, maybe it is the post office scale that is off a bit. I like that I can weigh heavier things than the smaller scales.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim and dam, have I not been let down in the least! Weighs dead on to what the scale at my local usps registers! I have had a few prior and they were a few ounces off and in a few cases that cost me some money. I am thoroughly happy with this scale and will definitely buy another one when I need it. IF I need it. This seems to very durable also!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: great scale!
customer_reviews.text: The tare weight sometimes creeps if you leave it on ( at least mine does ) So make sure you check yours. Just have to hit "tare" to zero it out with nothing on the scale. otherwise it's perfect! Not really an issue for me for shipping! I ship a lot of heavy items and it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Don’t know why it got bad reviews. If it works for 3 plus years I’ll have said I got my money’s worth. Basically 10 bucks a year to do all my shipping. It’s perfect been using it all day. Already saved me tons of time. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Melillo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really like the detached readout & plug-in. Can't believe I used a 4lb max battery operated digital scale & bathroom scale for so long. Seems to be very accurate & have had no issues with the post office since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Toast!

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Scale
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it doesn't get much better than this if you regularly ship out packages and want to make things easier for yourself. Very accurate, easy to use, good features.
customer_reviews.author: Adam V.

customer_reviews.title: It works 50% of the time
customer_reviews.text: The scale keeps fluctuating and gives inaccurate reading. I always have to turn it off and turn it back on to get it working. Even then I’m not sure if what it is showing is accurate or not.
customer_reviews.author: Zarah

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: This does about all you could hope for in a postal/shipping scale. It seems very accurate and I really like that you can change the measurement unit because depending on where I'm shipping and what country I'm dealing with, I may need to know grams, ounces, pounds and ounces, etc. and this scale does it all. I also like the fact that the readout and controls are a separate unit so you can have a large box on the scale part but still read the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think there's a ghost in my machine.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty great (for the price). I'd give this baby 5 stars, except there's a weird thing with it where whenever it feels a draft, it automatically sets itself to 0.2, rather than 0.0. Kind of annoying. Other than that, it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: dmoz

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this scale, it replaces one that cost 150 ten years ago.
customer_reviews.author: bob murrin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A few nice features- the blue backlight makes the screen easier to read even in ok lighting conditiona. The remote corded screen separate from the base makes it easy to use without being occludes by whatever you’re weighing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Solid 5 Star Review
customer_reviews.text: This scale is best unit I have used. I do a lot of on line selling, and this scale fits all of my needs. The quality is very good, no problems whatsoever. The greatest feature is the coiled readout screen, allowing you to put the package on the scale and be able to read the weight without problems. Would definitely recommend this to anyone without hestitation
customer_reviews.author: James R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years now, and it still works wonderfully. I absolutely love it, and when this one dies I will be returning to this seller for my next one. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Andreacchio

customer_reviews.title: I have used this scale for a couple of years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scale for a couple of years. The weights are close to UPS Fedex. I rarely get a chargeback. USPS doesn't check weights so who cares. My packages weigh from 2 to 30 lbs. I had to buy another one because it stopped working. I took the new cord that connects the scale to the platform and it was fixed. The wires were worn out from being used on a daily basis. I wonder if I can buy a new wire. I don't need the new scale.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Use an average of once a week to weigh a package or two. I’ve had it about a year and half and it died...I’d have thought that it’d should’ve worked to weigh more than 75 packages or so (at most). Staying away from this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This was a necessary purchase since I send so many packages over the mail. It's great to use the USPS APP and this scale to buy 'shipping online' and send the packages without getting out of my house. The scale is very precise and has been working wonderfully for the last couples of week. I like that is not bulky, use very little space on my desk, and the extended cable allow me to see the amount of weight from wherever I want.
customer_reviews.author: iRaptor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I needed for Ebay sales!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I needed for my online e sales !
customer_reviews.author: *Jewel*

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This scale was nice, I bought it for weighing items for our online store. It seems to be accurate and everything works as intended. Only minor flaw is that the battery cover keeps falling off, I probably just got a faulty one though.
customer_reviews.author: SINA

customer_reviews.title: Great scale and fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Great scale, especially for the price! I checked around in some office supply stores and can't believe how much they were charging! It was definitely worth waiting 2 days for Amazon shipping. Works perfectly. I like that the display is separate from the scale so it is much easier to read when you have a larger box. It weighs really light items and heavier (up to 110 lbs). accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday scale
customer_reviews.text: I have a home based business where I ship frequently. This scale is perfect for items as light as a few ounces or super heavy items. I love the separate read out in case a box is covering the display. Great scale for USPS or UPS!
customer_reviews.author: elleem

customer_reviews.title: Great weight Scale
customer_reviews.text: Love this Scale Have had it for over a Year now Need to Weigh a Package or just about anything else, Buy it , Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Smart Weigh Digital Shipping and Postal Weight Scale, 110 pounds x 0.1 oz, UPS USPS Post Office Scale
feature_bullets: SMART DESIGN – Professional Postal Scale with wide platform to easily weigh a variety of package and mail sizes. Weight reading is displayed on an easy to read, backlit LCD display. AC Adapter included, Display unit has a long extendable cord that can be easily mounted on the wall. Perfect for either a home office or professional business. View the video under the additional photos for complete features

HELPFUL FEATURES – Digital us scale comes with a number of features to make shipping and mailing simple. Tare weighing function allows user to weigh an empty box or container for net weight determination. Hold button displays and locks the stabilized weight
ADVANCED WEIGHING – High precision sensors gives the most accurate weight readings while auto calibration option ensures package weight readings remain reliable and consistent

MULTIPLE MODES – Useful for a variety of weighing purposes, electronic postal scale displays readings in g, kg, lb and lb:oz. Scale has a high capacity up to 110lbs / 50kg with a division 0.1oz / 2g. USPS postal gives instant, accurate readings, sure to match up with the post office

CUSTOMER SERVICE/WARRANTY - Smart Weigh is dedicated to 100% customer satisfaction! We offer a 2 Year Warranty on all our products and our friendly customer service team is always ready to help with all questions or concerns. When you purchase a Smart Weigh Postal Shipping Scale you can be confident in your buying decision.
